interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 35.4 Inch Extra Long Silicone Back Scrubber for Shower, 2021 Updated Lengthen Back Scrubber Brush for Men and Women, Exfoliating Back Washer with Wall Hooks, Easy Clean, Comfortable Massage (Green 27.5in)
Review Date: 2020/09/02
Store: MAORULU
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.75 x 5.5 x 2.6 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '757173533773', 'Manufacturer': 'MAORULU'}
Review Text: My favorite part of this is the sticky hooks that come with it. I tried putting body wash on it but it's a bit tricky to do. The one side with the bristles feels great on your back the opposite side isn't anything special. Very easy to clean and nice that you can hang it anywhere.
Review Title: The extras make it worth it
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
{'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
Well atleast you get the light! If you want color polish, you will have to go buy some. I was wondering where it was because it shows it on the box. I decided to read other reviews and see if I was the only one. Turns out it just isn't in the box. I've had other kits in the past and was hoping this one would be better but it was the worst. The top/base coat was very runny which made it very hard to paint my nails properly.
Some items not included

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for DIY Nail Care:** The user shows a clear interest in at-home manicures and nail care products.
- **Interest in Kits:** They seek starter kits, indicating a preference for bundled products that provide essential tools and materials.
- **Quality Expectations:** The user has high expectations for product quality and completeness, as evidenced by disappointment when essential items are missing or when products do not perform effectively.
- **Review Behavior:** They are likely to research reviews from other users before making decisions, demonstrating a methodical approach to purchasing.
- **Skepticism Towards Marketing:** The user expresses frustration with misleading packaging or incomplete product contents, suggesting a tendency to be critical of brands that do not meet advertised promises.
- **Experience with Alternatives:** They reference previous experiences with other kits, demonstrating familiarity with the category and a comparative perspective.
- **Specific Issues Noted:** Preference for consistency in product texture (e.g., top/base coats) and performance, reflecting an emphasis on user-friendliness in application.

- **Expanded Interests:** The user has shown an interest in bath and body products, particularly items that facilitate self-care routines. They appreciate additional features such as hooks for easy storage and practicality in use, but they also seek efficiency in application and overall performance from these products.

Overall, this user values transparency, quality, and complete product offerings in both their nail and body care purchases.
